mapper.sql: tent_id, deleted, update_time, create_time, patent_tame, patent_rank, patent_form, authority, registration_enterprise, patent_num, user_id, file_id
patent.authority, patent.deleted, patent.file_id, patent.patent_form, patent.patent_num, patent.patent_rank, patent.patent_tame, patent.registration_enterprise, patent.tent_id, f.url
mapper.select:

FROM patent JOIN filepath AS f ON f.file_id = patent.file_id where tent_id = #{tentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.update:
update patent
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
patent_tame = #{patentTame,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
patent_rank = #{patentRank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
patent_form = #{patentForm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
authority = #{authority,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
registration_enterprise = #{registrationEnterprise,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
patent_num = #{patentNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
file_id = #{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where tent_id = #{tentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update patent set deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, patent_tame = #{patentTame,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, patent_rank = #{patentRank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, patent_form = #{patentForm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, authority = #{authority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, registration_enterprise = #{registrationEnterprise,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, patent_num = #{patentNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, file_id = #{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where tent_id = #{tentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT patent.authority, patent.deleted, patent.file_id, patent.patent_form, patent.patent_num, patent.patent_rank, patent.patent_tame, patent.registration_enterprise, patent.tent_id, f.url FROM patent JOIN filepath AS f ON f.file_id = patent.file_id where patent.user_id=#{user_id}
